channel.title: Where would i put this?
channel.description: where in client.java does this go exactly [code]public boolean Yell = true;[/code] and since i get this error i think i put it in the wrong area lol [code]client.java:6: class, interface, or enum expected public boolean Yell = true; ^ 1 error Files Compiled Successfully! Press any key to continue . . .[/code]

item.title: Where would i put this?
item.dc:creator: @slomifier slomifier
item.description:
@slomifier wrote:

The variable “yell” isn’t defined, the computer doesn’t understand the word “yell”.

item.title: Where would i put this?
item.dc:creator: @WRX WRX`
item.description:
@WRX wrote:

Search one of the following:

public int aaa;
public int abc;
public int abc2;
public int actionButtonId = 0;
public boolean adding = false, emoting = false;

It should fit near those, if not. Post back.

Read full topic
